TEXT.S: Cameron Itini i 6 00 N, 12 00 E, noAfilika ko Cameron. Polong no sekalay i 475,440 sq km "saka 54 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 472,710 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 2,730 sq km " Polong i 24,360,803 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 20.60 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 41.70 , malo no roma to a sera 37.70 . siyoto O [[[Yaounde]] ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakalima 20 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Paul Biya, patirengan a romi'ad i 1982 a miheca saka 11 folad saka 6 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
